title: Implement council review mechanism (Phase 2)
description: EVAL-002: Create council-driven model recommendation system. Components: (1) Model release tracker for Anthropic/OpenAI/local models, (2) Performance analyzer reads trace.jsonl to compute model-to-task patterns, (3) Recommendation engine suggests new models respecting non-OpenAI preference (must be clearly better), (4) OpenRouter integration for testing frontier models. Outputs periodic review reports.

Enables data collection for model-to-task assignment decisions.

title: Update internal documentation URLs to meganerd org
description: URL-001: Update all internal references from github.com/noperator/siftrank to github.com/meganerd/siftrank where appropriate. This includes: (1) Go import paths in pkg/siftrank/siftrank.go, pkg/siftrank/factory.go, cmd/siftrank/main.go, (2) Installation command in README.md (go install), (3) Repository file links in README.md (testdata/sentences.txt link). Preserve upstream project references (Bishop Fox/Raink links in Acknowledgements section already use correct upstream URLs).
